Contributor: Darling, Jay N. (Jay Norwood), 1876-1962, artist.; American Women's Hospitals, publisher.;
Note: Signed "J.N. Ding." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says you should not be tired of giving because you don't know what it really is to be tired, so give and help these people. Illustration shows a women and child sitting among the ruins.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Tired of giving?
